amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, places limits and conditions on the provision giving the President the power to delay the imposition of sanctions against a foreign country if such sanctions would endanger an intelligence source or compromise an ongoing investigation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of September 12 as amendment No. 3, to end after three years the provisions in the bill allowing the President to delay the imposition of sanctions against other countries if the sanctions compromise an intelligence source or an ongoing criminal investigation.

action.text: Combest amendment (A001) modified by unanimous consent. A technical modification making the report to be written to the Congress, by the President, "prompt and timely".
On agreeing to the Combest amendment (A001) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
